amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $105 million to NASA's science, aeronautics, and technology programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the appropriation (by transfer) for NASA's Science, Aeronautics, and Technology account by $105,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogan amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 235 (Roll no. 395).
